title: Protect the Ozone Layer - 1 Gas/Base - ICYFAR - G1-2 The PiG Daily #160
excerpt: In today’s ICYFAR players were challenged to help protect the ozone layer by reducing vespene emissions in the Koprulu Sector by 50%! They were allowed to only take 1 gas at each base and had to adapt to a much lower gas economy.   ICYFAR is “I Cast Your Freakin Awesome Replays” where there’s a weekly
